comments:
To reproduce, create the following XML document using 

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<vxml xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/vxml"
	xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
	xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.w3.org/2001/vxml 
    http://www.w3.org/TR/voicexml20/vxml.xsd"
	version="2.0">
	<form>
		<block>Hello World!</block>
	</form>
</vxml>

Try to autocomplete (Ctl-Space) after the <form> element.
This triggers a stack overflow error in Eclipse, with the following log trace:

!SESSION 2007-10-12 10:12:35.694 -----------------------------------------------
eclipse.buildId=M20070921-1145
java.version=1.6.0_02
java.vendor=Sun Microsystems Inc.

!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 4 0 2007-10-12 15:01:00.707
!MESSAGE Unhandled event loop exception
!STACK 0
java.lang.StackOverflowError
	at org.eclipse.xsd.impl.XSDComplexTypeDefinitionImpl.getRootTypeDefinition(XSDComplexTypeDefinitionImpl.java:2772)
	at org.eclipse.xsd.impl.XSDComplexTypeDefinitionImpl.getRootType(XSDComplexTypeDefinitionImpl.java:2767)

	at org.eclipse.wst.xsd.contentmodel.internal.XSDImpl.isTypeDerivedFrom(XSDImpl.java:546)
etc, until maximum log file size is reached.

The type speak is circular.

isTypeDerivedFrom doesn't account for circular definitions.
Fix checked in for WTP 3.0 M3.
Fix is in XSDImpl in xsd.core
